about_the_game:
Dear Brother an immersive FPS adventure set in a world steeped in witchcraft and magic. Traverse bewitched forests, shadowy dungeons, and enigmatic villages as you uncover arcane mysteries and embark on a journey of brotherhood and betrayal. Prepare to be spellbound by the magic that awaits you.

You and your squad stumble upon a wanted poster featuring the Beast. Your mission: track down and eliminate the creature! But beware, other squads are after the same target. Move swiftly and stay vigilant as you navigate the hunt for the Beast, for victory will only go to the quickest and most skilled hunters.

And as if that wasn't challenging enough, there are also witches lurking in the shadows. Navigate the treacherous terrain while evading the dark magic of these formidable adversaries. Keep your wits about you, for the hunt for the Beast becomes even more perilous with the presence of these powerful sorceresses

Customize your weapon. Modify each weapon according to your taste. Whether it's a larger magazine, different scopes, fire mode selection, or even ammunition. You can always choose between two parts to modify.

Our roadmap promises a continuous stream of updates, introducing a wealth of new firearms and modifications to keep the gameplay fresh and exhilarating. From innovative attachments to cutting-edge weaponry, each update guarantees a wealth of options for players to explore, ensuring endless variety and excitement on the battlefield.

We offer 5 different types of ammunition, each with various effects on gameplay. What makes them unique is that certain materials must be found to craft them. Dive into a tactical adventure and explore the diversity of our ammunition types, enriching your gaming experience

  • RUNES:Find and Collect them during the Game.They are useful to Heal yourself or to revive your Teammates.

  • Blessing:Your Choise, Good or Bad.
    Both decisions will have an Impact on your Gameplay.

  • PERKS:
    Customize your hunter the way you want. There are different options to modify your character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU 7th Gen 7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT, with a minimum of 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU 8th Gen 8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2700
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 Super / AMD 6600 XT, with a minimum of 8GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
